name: Argyris Petridis
personality: Disciplined and meticulous, often puts the needs of his team before his own.
story: Argyris was born and raised in Athens, Greece. He enlisted in the Greek Army right after he completed high school and served for six years as an armored vehicle crewman. After his tour of duty, he joined the Independent faction as a contractor and has since served with distinction for the past eight years.
